name: Complot
description:
In Complot it's all about uncovering the truth. The truth that those at the top are
controlling us. The sheeple in our society are too ignorant to realize this. 

There is symbolism everywhere, and it’s all connected. When multiple news articles use the same words, is that a coincidence, or is it a conspiracy? Is it a coincidence when multiple famous actors make the same hand gesture, or are they all part of a secret group?

Use your bulletin board and red threads to find connections in news articles and uncover the truth.
